name: Cable Boy
description:
Created for the GMTK Jam, Cable Boy puts you in the electric boots of a cable head guy trying to find his girlfriend. You will have to be a skilled platformerer to make it through this small LIGHTNING fast game (that was made in 48 hours!)

Connect cables to operate contraptions and clear the path ahead. Avoid fire and electric rats! Can you make it to the end!?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys to Move
  • Z to Jump
  • X to Whip
  • F1 will skip a level if you are stuck!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
